memberdef.name: _MI_XOR_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'Xortify - Sector Network Security - Fortify your XOOPS'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_USERNAME_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'You can get one of these by going to the menu Sign-up'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PASSWORD_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'You assign one of these by going to the menu Sign-up'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SECONDS_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'Period of time for ban list to be invocated!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_USERCREATED_PLEASEACTIVATE
memberdef.initializer: 'Check Your Email for Activation Email, Click on the activation link to activate module!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_FRM_NOSOAP_DISCLAIMER
memberdef.initializer:
'There is no API Communication with Xortify.com check you have PHP SOAP installed as an extension and you have no firewalls preventing normal SOAP Protocol Communication. You will not be able to continue until this message has been replaced with the Xortify Disclaimer.

The Submit button below will appear when this is working, xortify is currently Offline'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PROTOCOL_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the protocol that is used in the communication with the xortify cloud!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_URISOAP_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for SOAP Communication (With Trailing Slash)'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_URICURL_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for CURL JSON Communication (With Trailing Slash)'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_URIJSON_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for wGET JSON (With Trailing Slash)'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PHP_NUMBEROFDAYS
memberdef.initializer: 'Project Honeypot - Last Number of Days Seen'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PHP_NUMBEROFDAYS_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the number of days upto that the IP has been seen and flagged by project honeypot'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PHP_SEVERITYLEVEL_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the severity level on the honeypot that the IP has been seen and flagged by project honeypot'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_PHP_SCANMODE_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This list is in a hierachy which will ban from what you select and down in the list from severity.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_EMAILFREQUENCY
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - Number of time email address has been reported'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_EMAILFREQUENCY_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the number of time the email has been reported as spam and will ban the IP and details when it occurs at this level.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_UNAMEFREQUENCY
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - Number of time username has been reported'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_UNAMEFREQUENCY_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the number of time the username has been reported as spam and will ban the IP and details when it occurs at this level.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_IPFREQUENCY
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - Number of time IP address has been reported'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_IPFREQUENCY_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the number of time the IP Address has been reported as spam and will ban the IP and details when it occurs at this level.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_EMAILLASTSEEN
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - How long ago the email address was seen'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_EMAILLASTSEEN_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the period of time allocated to wence the email was last seen, if it occured after this period it will not be banned!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_UNAMELASTSEEN
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - How long ago the username was seen'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_UNAMELASTSEEN_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the period of time allocated to wence the username was last seen, if it occured after this period it will not be banned!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_IPLASTSEEN
memberdef.initializer: 'Stop Forum Spam - How long ago the IP address was seen'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_SFS_IPLASTSEEN_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the period of time allocated to wence the IP address was last seen, if it occured after this period it will not be banned!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_LOG_BANNED_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'When Xortify Bans something on the cloud, then log it!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_LOG_BLOCKED_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'When Xortify Blocks something as detected on the cloud, then log it!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_LOG_MONITORED_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'When Xortify Monitor\'s something/someone as detected on the cloud, then log it!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_LOGDROPS_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is how long the log stays on your site for after a record reaches this age it is deleted!'

memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for Serialisation Communication in cURL or wGET (With Trailing Slash)'

memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for cURL or wGET for XML Communication (With Trailing Slash)'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_IPCACHE_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the amount of time an IP Address and information on it is cached!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CRONTYPE_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the type of scheduling system you are using for your cron job'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CRONINTERVAL_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the interval in seconds between each cron'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_FAULT_DELAY
memberdef.initializer: 'Number of second to delay function on fault!'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_FAULT_DELAY_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'If a fault occurs in the preloader, xortify will delay this function before calling it again this many seconds (Default 10 minutes)'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CURL_TIMOUT
memberdef.initializer: 'Total amount of seconds a CURL Waits for a Response'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CURL_TIMOUT_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the total amount of seconds a CURL waits for a response after resolving the DNS.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CURL_CONNECTTIMOUT
memberdef.initializer: 'Total amount of seconds a CURL Waits for DNS to resolve'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_CURL_CONNECTTIMOUT_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the total amount of seconds a CURL waits for a DNS Lookup to resolve.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_MI_URIREST_DESC
memberdef.initializer: 'This is the URL for cURL or wGET for REST API Communication (With Trailing Slash)'
